mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (tea_id, title, content, class_id) VALUES (#{teaId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{classId})
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, tea_id AS teaId, class_id AS classId, title, content, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM notice WHERE class_id=#{classId}
